job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As a Microsoft 365 Engineer, you will be part of the Unified Communication & Collaboration Area, which consists of four DevOps teams. You will work on our M365 Copilot Scale-up project. You will collaborate closely with the Product Owner, other Platform Engineers, Solution Architects, and colleagues from other teams. This role involves turning ideas into tasks and making sure they're done on time and within budget. You'll keep projects moving, ensuring everyone is on the same page and motivated. You'll lead tasks efficiently, solve problems as they come up, and work closely with the team and stakeholders. You'll need to adapt to changes and make sure all deliverables meet the required standards., * Define strategy and governance for M365 Copilot and SharePoint Online.
     * Participate in DevOps user stories for M365 Copilot and SharePoint
     * Implement M365 Copilot and SharePoint solutions and advise on data control
     * Develop and maintain services to extend the M365 platform.
     * Advise end-users on the efficient use of Microsoft 365 tools according to the bank's guidelines., * The opportunity to work on Microsoft Copilot scale-up and Microsoft 365 Copilot technical readiness projects.
     * An environment where you can develop yourself and expand your expertise.
     * Collaboration with colleagues from diverse cultural backgrounds.
job_details.full_text:
Microsoft 365 Engineer - Copilot & Collaboration

As a Microsoft 365 Engineer, you will be part of the Unified Communication & Collaboration Area, which consists of four DevOps teams. You will work on our M365 Copilot Scale-up project. You will collaborate closely with the Product Owner, other Platform Engineers, Solution Architects, and colleagues from other teams. This role involves turning ideas into tasks and making sure they're done on time and within budget. You'll keep projects moving, ensuring everyone is on the same page and motivated. You'll lead tasks efficiently, solve problems as they come up, and work closely with the team and stakeholders. You'll need to adapt to changes and make sure all deliverables meet the required standards., * Define strategy and governance for M365 Copilot and SharePoint Online.
     * Participate in DevOps user stories for M365 Copilot and SharePoint
     * Implement M365 Copilot and SharePoint solutions and advise on data control
     * Develop and maintain services to extend the M365 platform.
     * Advise end-users on the efficient use of Microsoft 365 tools according to the bank's guidelines., * The opportunity to work on Microsoft Copilot scale-up and Microsoft 365 Copilot technical readiness projects.
     * An environment where you can develop yourself and expand your expertise.
     * Collaboration with colleagues from diverse cultural backgrounds.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on engineering and implementing Microsoft 365 solutions, specifically M365 Copilot and SharePoint Online. While it involves collaboration and technical tasks related to Microsoft products, it does not align with the core responsibilities or technologies of an ML Engineer or GenAI Engineer as defined in the Coding Book. The role appears to be more focused on platform engineering and administration within the Microsoft ecosystem, rather than developing or deploying AI models. The mention of 'M365 Copilot' refers to the use of an AI tool within a specific platform, not the development or fine-tuning of generative models themselves. Therefore, it falls under the 'Ambiguous' category due to its focus on platform engineering and the use of AI tools rather than AI development.

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'turning ideas into tasks and making sure they're done on time and within budget' and 'align technical solutions with strategic goals' (implied by defining strategy and governance) indicates an understanding of business context and project management.
job_tasks.phrase: turning ideas into tasks and making sure they're done on time and within budget

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Define strategy and governance for M365 Copilot and SharePoint Online' shows an understanding of how to align technical solutions with broader organizational goals and policies.
job_tasks.phrase: Define strategy and governance for M365 Copilot and SharePoint Online

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Implement M365 Copilot and SharePoint solutions' suggests the practical application and deployment of these technologies, which falls under software development in the context of platform integration.
job_tasks.phrase: Implement M365 Copilot and SharePoint solutions

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Develop and maintain services to extend the M365 platform' directly relates to building and supporting software components within a specific platform.
job_tasks.phrase: Develop and maintain services to extend the M365 platform

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Participate in DevOps user stories for M365 Copilot and SharePoint' indicates involvement in the operational aspects of software development and deployment within a DevOps framework.
job_tasks.phrase: Participate in DevOps user stories for M365 Copilot and SharePoint
